verses.verse: Then the Lord<WH3068> answered<WH6030> Job<WH347> out of the whirlwind<WH5591>, and said<WH559>,
Who is this that darkens<WH2821> counsel<WH6098> by words<WH4405> outside knowledge<WH1847>?
Clothe up<WH247> now your body<WH2504> like a man<WH1397>; for I will demand<WH7592> of you<WH3045>, and answer you me.
Where<WH375> were you when I laid the foundations<WH3245> of the earth<WH776>? declare<WH5046>, if you have<WH3045> understanding<WH998>.
Who has laid<WH7760> the measures<WH4461> there<WH3045>, if you know? or who has stretched<WH5186> the line upon it<WH6957>?
Whereupon are the foundations<WH134> there fastened<WH2883>? or who laid<WH3384> the corner<WH6438> stone there<WH68>;
When the morning<WH1242> stars<WH3556> sang<WH7442> together<WH3162>, and all the sons<WH1121> of God<WH430> shouted for joy<WH7321>?
Or who shut up<WH5526> the sea<WH3220> with doors<WH1817>, when it broke forth<WH1518>, as if it had issued out<WH3318> of the womb<WH7358>?
When I made<WH7760> the cloud<WH6051> the garment<WH3830> there<WH6205>, and thick darkness a swaddlingband for it<WH2854>,
And broke up<WH7665> for it my decreed<WH2706> place<WH7760>, and set bars<WH1280> and doors<WH1817>,
And said<WH559>, Here<WH5704> shall you come<WH935>, but no further<WH3254>: and here shall your proud<WH1347> waves<WH1530> be stayed<WH7896>?
Have you commanded<WH6680> the morning<WH1242> since your days<WH3117>; and caused the dayspring<WH7837> to know<WH3045> his place<WH4725>;
That it might take hold<WH270> of the ends<WH3671> of the earth<WH776>, that the wicked<WH7563> might be shaken out of it<WH5287>?
It is turned<WH2015> as clay<WH2563> to the seal<WH2368>; and they stand<WH3320> as a garment<WH3830>.
And from the wicked<WH7563> their light<WH216> is withheld<WH4513>, and the high<WH7311> arm<WH2220> shall be broken<WH7665>.
Have you entered<WH935> into the springs<WH5033> of the sea<WH3220>? or have you walked<WH1980> in the search<WH2714> of the depth<WH8415>?
Have the gates<WH8179> of death<WH4194> been opened<WH1540> unto you<WH7200>? or have you seen the doors<WH8179> of the shadow of death<WH6757>?
Have you perceived<WH995> the breadth<WH7338> of the earth<WH776>? Declare<WH5046> if you know it all<WH3045>.
Where is the way<WH1870> where light<WH216> dwells<WH7931>? and as for darkness<WH2822>, where is the place there<WH4725>,
That you should take<WH3947> it to the bound<WH1366> there<WH995>, and that you should know the paths<WH5410> to the house there<WH1004>?
Know<WH3045> you it<WH3205>, because you were then born? or because the number<WH4557> of your days<WH3117> is great<WH7227>?
Have you entered<WH935> into the treasures<WH214> of the snow<WH7950>? or have you seen<WH7200> the treasures<WH214> of the hail<WH1259>,
Which I have reserved<WH2820> against the time<WH6256> of trouble<WH6862>, against the day<WH3117> of battle<WH7128> and war<WH4421>?
By what<WH335> way<WH1870> is the light<WH216> parted<WH2505>, which scatters<WH6327> the east wind<WH6921> upon the earth<WH776>?
Who has divided<WH6385> a watercourse<WH8585> for the overflowing of waters<WH7858>, or a way<WH1870> for the lightning<WH2385> of thunder<WH6963>;
To cause it to rain<WH4305> on the earth<WH776>, where no man<WH376> is<WH4057>; on the wilderness, where there is no man<WH120>;
To satisfy<WH7646> the desolate<WH7722> and waste<WH4875> ground<WH4161>; and to cause the bud of the tender herb<WH1877> to spring forth<WH6779>?
Has<WH3426> the rain<WH4306> a father<WH1>? or who has fathered<WH3205> the drops<WH96> of dew<WH2919>?
Out of whose womb<WH990> came<WH3318> the ice<WH7140>? and the hoary frost<WH3713> of heaven<WH8064>, who has birthed it<WH3205>?
The waters<WH4325> are hid<WH2244> as with a stone<WH68>, and the face<WH6440> of the deep<WH8415> is frozen<WH3920>.
Can you bind<WH7194> the sweet influences<WH4575> of Pleiades<WH3598>, or loose<WH6605> the bands<WH4189> of Orion<WH3685>?
Can you bring forth<WH3318> Mazzaroth<WH4216> in his season<WH6256>? or can you guide<WH5148> Arcturus<WH5906> with his sons<WH1121>?
Know<WH3045> you the ordinances<WH2708> of heaven<WH8064>? can you set<WH7760> the dominion<WH4896> there in the earth<WH776>?
Can you lift up<WH7311> your voice<WH6963> to the clouds<WH5645>, that abundance<WH8229> of waters<WH4325> may cover you<WH3680>?
Can you send<WH7971> lightnings<WH1300>, that they may go<WH3212>, and say unto you<WH559>, Here we are?
Who has put<WH7896> wisdom<WH2451> in the inward parts<WH2910>? or who has given<WH5414> understanding<WH998> to the heart<WH7907>?
Who can number<WH5608> the clouds<WH7834> in wisdom<WH2451>? or who can stay<WH7901> the bottles<WH5035> of heaven<WH8064>,
When the dust<WH6083> grows<WH3332> into hardness<WH4165>, and the clods<WH7263> cleave fast together<WH1692>?
Will you hunt<WH6679> the prey<WH2964> for the lion<WH3833>? or fill<WH4390> the appetite<WH2416> of the young lions<WH3715>,
When they couch<WH7817> in their dens<WH4585>, and stay<WH3427> in the covert<WH5521> to<WH3926> lie in wait<WH695>?
Who provides<WH3559> for the raven<WH6158> his food<WH6718>? when his young ones<WH3206> cry<WH7768> unto God<WH410>, they wander<WH8582> for lack<WH1097> of food<WH400>.
